abstract: DriveCam, which manages and assesses driver risk, has secured $19 million in Series D funding, the company said in a statement.

lead_paragraph: DriveCam, which manages and assesses driver risk, has secured $19 million in Series D funding, the company said in a statement.

headline.main: DriveCam Captures $19 Million in Series D Funding
